FuncDef: The display vrrp command displays the status and parameters of a VRRP backup group.
CLIs: display vrrp [ [ interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ <virtual-id> ] [ [ verbose ] | [ brief ] ] ] | [ brief ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
The interface type can only be Ethernet.

Specifies the ID of a VRRP backup group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Displays detailed information about the current VRRP group.
-

Displays brief information about the current VRRP group.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display vrrp command displays information about VRRP backup groups.
If you do not specify the interface-type, interface-number nor virtual-id parameter, detailed information about all VRRP backup groups on the Router is displayed.If you specify only the interface-type and interface-number parameters, detailed information about all VRRP backup groups on the specified interface is displayed.If you specify the interface-type, interface-number and virtual-id parameters, detailed information about the specified VRRP backup group on the specified interface is displayed.

Precautions
At least one VRRP backup group must be configured before you run the display vrrp command; otherwise, no information is displayed.
